Articles.Content: Is there anyway to make it bigger? I would love to be able to construct wider spacecraft or launch a decent sized space station into orbit.

Is there anyway to make it bigger? I would love to be able to construct wider spacecraft or launch a decent sized space station into orbit.

No, but there are ways around it; if you move your ship far enough to one side, you can start on the ground next to it (although you run a significant risking of spawning under the ground).
you can move your ship to the side? That would do lol, how?

you can move your ship to the side? That would do lol, how?

Hold Shift and select your ship, then move it as far to the side as you can. Change your camera angle, and do it again; you should be able to get it near (or through) the edge of the VAB; then, just launch normally. Remember to save first.
Thanks very much. had no idea the position in the VAB affected launch position.
